MARCHALA SAI RUCHITH
Phone 7942606799

Hanamakonda,Telengana
Email msairuchith@gmail.com
Career Objective
To gain hands-on experience in logistics and supply chain
management while contributing to organizational success and
pursuing professional development in operational excellence, To
develop a long-term career in logistics, contributing to the
improvement of supply chain processes, reducing operational
inefficiencies, and advancing into leadership roles, To work in a
logistics role where I can implement sustainable practices,
optimize resource utilization, and contribute to a company’s
environmental goals
EDUCATION
Degree Pursuing

Month/Year of Completion
BBA (Logistics)

2026

2021

SKILLS
Project Management, Business Analysis, Supply Chain
Optimization, Logistics Management, International Logistics,
Risk Management, Supply Chain Analytics, Negotiation.
Key Course Works
Fundamentals of Logistics, Material Management, Warehousing
& Distribution centre Operations, Freight Forwarding (Ocean
and Air Cargo), Forecasting and Inventory Management,
Surface Management, MIS For Logistics.
